title: E-Commerce Website
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, and payment integration.

Implemented secure backend with Node.js and MongoDB

fullDescription:
Web Development

E-Commerce Website

Project Overview

A comprehensive e-commerce platform featuring user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and secure payment processing.

Key Features

  • User Authentication: Secure login/signup with JWT tokens
  • Product Management: Admin panel for adding/editing products
  • Payment Integration: Stripe API for secure transactions
  • Responsive Design: Mobile-first approach with Bootstrap

Technologies Used

Frontend: React, Redux, Bootstrap. Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB. Deployment: AWS EC2, S3.

Data Visualization Dashboard

Project Overview

An interactive dashboard that visualizes sales data, provides real-time updates, and includes predictive analytics for business insights.

Key Features

  • Interactive Charts: Custom visualizations with D3.js
  • Real-time Updates: WebSocket integration for live data

  • Responsive Design: Works on all device sizes

Reduced decision-making time by 40% and improved sales forecasting accuracy by 25%.

title: TaskFlow - Mobile Task Management
description: A sleek, intuitive mobile application designed for efficient task management with advanced collaboration features and seamless synchronization.
achievements: Built cross-platform app with 95% code reusability
Implemented real-time synchronization with conflict resolution
Integrated advanced notification system with smart scheduling
Achieved 4.8-star rating on both app stores
fullDescription:
Mobile Development

TaskFlow - Mobile Task Management

Project Overview

A comprehensive mobile application that revolutionizes task management with intelligent features, seamless collaboration, and enterprise-grade synchronization capabilities.

Key Features

  • Smart Task Management: AI-powered task prioritization and deadline predictions
    • Advanced Collaboration: Real-time team workspaces with role-based permissions
  • Offline-First Architecture: Full functionality without internet connectivity
  • Cross-Platform Excellence: Native performance on iOS and Android from single codebase

Technical Excellence

Utilized React Native with Redux Toolkit for state management, Firebase for backend services, and implemented custom conflict resolution algorithms for seamless data synchronization.

Market Success

Successfully published on both App Store and Google Play, achieving over 15,000 downloads and maintaining a 4.8-star average rating through continuous user feedback integration.

Weather Analytics App

Project Overview

An advanced weather analytics application that provides accurate predictions and detailed climate analysis using machine learning algorithms.

Key Features

  • ML Predictions: 85% accurate weather forecasting
  • Interactive Maps: Real-time weather visualization
  • Historical Analysis: Climate pattern recognition
  • API Integration: Multiple weather data sources

Technical Implementation

Built with Python and TensorFlow, featuring custom ML models trained on historical weather data and integrated with multiple weather APIs for comprehensive coverage.

title: Smart Home IoT System
description: Complete IoT solution for smart home automation with voice control, energy monitoring, and security features.
achievements: Developed custom IoT firmware for multiple devices
Implemented secure cloud connectivity and data storage
Created mobile app for remote control and monitoring
Reduced energy consumption by 30%
fullDescription:
IoT Development

Smart Home IoT System

Project Overview

A comprehensive IoT solution that transforms traditional homes into smart, automated environments with energy efficiency and security features.

Key Features

  • Voice Control: Integration with Google Assistant and Alexa
  • Energy Monitoring: Real-time consumption tracking and optimization
  • Security System: Motion detection and remote surveillance
  • Mobile Control: iOS and Android app for remote management

Hardware & Software

Custom firmware for Arduino and ESP32 devices, Raspberry Pi central hub, MQTT protocol for communication, and cloud-based data storage with real-time synchronization.
